page.title: 12Eppleby Village Hall ST
page.content: The village hall was opened in{1957.} The building funds were raised by Whist Drives, Dances and Donations. It has one{main hall}with a stage at one end of the hall and a{kitchen}behind it. Beside the kitchen there is a {supper room}and behind is a{storeroom} where the playgroup toys and our P.E. apparatus are kept. The{materials}that were used to build the village hall were plaster, brick and asbestos. The{extension} was added in 1973. { Users.}On Mondays and Wednesdays we go there for P.E. and on Tuesday and Thursday mornings it is play group. On Thursday afternoons it is the toddler group and Monday nights it is Badminton. The hall is also used for the clinic, W.I., youth club, classes, bazaars, concerts and parties.
